meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Equisetum.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cluster of equisetums by the pond.
meanings.sent3: The equisetums in the garden seem to be chatting with the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The equisetums stood tall like ancient guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the delicate leaves of the equisetums.

meanings.sent1: We studied different types of equisetums in biology class.
meanings.sent2: The equisetums in the field swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The equisetums at the park picnic outnumbered the guests.
meanings.sent4: The equisetums in the vase added a touch of nature to the room.
meanings.sent5: The equisetums in the forest whispered secrets of the earth.
